title: Thunderbird corrupted (?) after uploading latest Ventura OS
content:
I uploaded the latest version of Ventura to my IMac....and it said that something was wrong with my Thunderbird and that I should trash it. When I went to re-sign up and re-connect to my Mindspring/EarthLink account, it appears that I've lost all of my past emails (and group lists, etc.)

Is that gone forever or is there a way to retrieve 20 years of history?????

title: Thunderbird not able to log into server - new Outlook requirements?
content:
Until today Thunderbird would get my email from the Outlook server, outlook.office365.com. Today it stopped working and I can't get my emails. I do get new emails using Outlook. Looked as though it might be new requirements (OAuth2 instead of Normal Password) so I tried changing to OAuth2. Now it pops up a window "Enter credentials for symonjim@sybr.net on outlook.office365.com". At first it always came up blank. Now it comes up asking me to log in to Google. I tried to eliminate any sort of reference or connection to Google but I can't get rid of it and any attempt to log in to Google fails.

How can I do OAuth2 into outlook from Thunderbird?

Why does the new credentials window either come up blank or insisting on Google?

Thanks.
creator: symonjim

title: Sendiing PDF file with Thunderbird past 3 months end up unreadable to sender
content:
Thunderbird 102.12.0 I have used and sent PDF files to people for 20+ years. Last few weeks I will get a response from senders that they cannot open the PDF. Not every time. Same file(s) I have sent for years. I can open the files fine, even on a recent Chromebook. Before sending I can right click the PDF and open it before being sent. I use Thunderbird for 2 different Email accounts. I can send from one account TO my main account (butkus.org) and it works, I can open the PDF. I have tried different files.

If I sent from my main account, Butkus.org to another account, it cannot be opened. They are only 9mb in size. They are "certified" PDF files (locked from changes) as well as standard PDF files. The file size is correct when received. I try even saving it first. I can put the same file on my website, and they can be opened. I can send them to me (butkus.org) from other accounts and open that same account fine ? ? So it's only outgoing PDF problems. I did try the "right click" and repair folders.
creator: mbutkus

title: reinstalled Thunderbird - where can I find my old local folders?
content: I reinstalled Thunderbird. I don't see all my old saved messages. Is there some way/somewhere I can recover them?

title: Opening links i emails: posix_spawn: Permission denied (13)
content:
Using Debian 11.7 with thunderbird 1:102.12.0-1~deb11u1

Tried with and without setting network.protocol-handler. xdg-open https://github.com/ works fine. So does sensible-browser. xdg-settings get default-web-browser => google-chrome.desktop KDE default browser is Google Chrome.

/etc/alternatives/gnome-www-browser -> /usr/bin/google-chrome-stable /etc/alternatives/x-www-browser -> /usr/bin/google-chrome-stable /usr/bin/google-chrome-stable -> /opt/google/chrome/google-chrome

Tried running thunderbird in troubleshooting mode. Running LANG=C thunderbird and opening links gives:

[4242:4242:0705/195659.393537:FATAL:spawn_subprocess.cc(221)] posix_spawn: Permission denied (13)
creator: aigan

title: How to change each insertable table border to a simple thin line?
content: On border width=1, inserted tables' four outer borders are doubled as if to depict in 2D a picture frame. How to change each to a simple thin line?
creator: Detail

title: How to set a particular account for default sending?
content:
I have 20 email accounts on Thunderbird. All that works fine. If I click to reply to an email, the reply is sent from the account it came from. Fine.

If I click write to write a new email, it sends from the account that is currently highlighted. This is causing me trouble, because I mostly only send emails from account 2. But sometimes I forget. Old age. And someone gets an email from an address they don't recognize.

I don't know if there is a way to configure the default sending address, regardless of which account is currently highlighted.

Is there a way to make that default to account two, or any particular account? To stop these errors caused mostly by me! As I said this does not happen for replies, only new emails.
creator: steve.waechter

title: Delay in posting link to latest binary
content:
I've notice that the Mozilla Foundation Security Advisory page is very timely on release details of security fixed but the Thunderbird Release Notes and main download link are not.

When security patches are detailed here: https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/security/advisories/

Sometimes it is delayed DAYS before the updated binary is available for download on the main Thunderbird page https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/ or shown in the changelog at https://www.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/releases/

What is that? Isn't that kind of a big issue?
creator: evit

title: Your Thunderbird profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible.
content:
Perhaps due to full disk space, thunderbird stopped working on my PopOS 22.04 but since I reinstalled thunderbird, I'm seeing this error:Your Thunderbird profile cannot be loaded. It may be missing or inaccessible.

This is my profiles.ini:

[InstallFDC34C9F024745EB] default=ee1pfd9y.default-release

[Profile0] Name=default IsRelative=1 Path=ee1pfd9y.default-release Default=1

[General] StartWithLastProfile=1 Version=2

Here are the contents of the thunderbird directory:

~/.thunderbird$ ls 

2nm4o54f.default   ee1pfd9y.default-release  'Pending Pings'   v88qhkcg.default

'Crash Reports' installs.ini profiles.ini

What is not working here? I'd appreciate any pointers. Thank you.
creator: chsriram

title: The automatic email finder found a defunct address and won't let me change it to an actual email
content:
I didn't realize that Thunderbird was not an actual email rather than a tool to go get emails. (I was an almost 30 year patron of AOL and they just screwed us over so dawnearle has to find a new email.) How can I change the name and find another email that works?

Humans are far better than automatic programs when it comes to fixing problems!

As long as I still have to use the new crappy AOL for any email I'm dawnearle@ aol.com (you can delete the spaces in a reply)

Thanks for any aid you can offer.
